awakeningSkills.bonusNotes: Ignores bonus Lust damage based on Bleed Potency on the target

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to [Laceration] Potency on target.
- At 4+ Lust Reson., inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to ([Laceration] Potency on target x 1.2).
([Laceration] Potency up to only 99 will be used to calculate for this Skill.)
[EnemyKill] If this Skill or its Coin effects dealt damage that exceeds the target's(In Focused Encounters, the Core's) remaining HP, deal the excess damage as fixed damage between all enemies.

data.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 2 [Laceration] on target (max 6)
[StartBattle] The main target for this Skill does not lose [Laceration] Count for this turn.
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, Lose 10 SP at Turn End.
data.name: Sanguine Desire

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to ([Laceration] Potency on target x 1.2).
- At 4+ Lust Reson., inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to ([Laceration] Potency on target x 1.5).
- At 4+ Lust A-Reson., inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to ([Laceration] Potency on target x 1.8).
([Laceration] Potency up to only 99 will be used to calculate for this Skill.)
[EnemyKill] If this Skill or its Coin effects dealt damage that exceeds the target's(In Focused Encounters, the Core's) remaining HP, deal the excess damage as fixed damage between all enemies.

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict (2 + (Lust Reson.)) [Laceration]
(Maximum Lust Reson. taken into account : 4)

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (max 2)

passiveList.desc: This unit's leftmost Skill on the Dashboard inflicts double the [Laceration] Potency (once per turn)
